meta.title: ProtocolPal — Schedule & Track Your Routines
meta.description: A bilingual scheduling and tracking tool for personal routines. Offline-ready, mobile-first PWA.

hero.description: ProtocolPal helps you schedule routines, track adherence, and manage inventory — all in one clean, offline-ready app.
hero.cardDescription: A personal scheduling companion designed around simplicity and focus.

features.title: Everything you need to stay organised

scheduling.title: Flexible scheduling
scheduling.description: Set daily, every-other-day, weekly, or custom intervals. ProtocolPal generates your schedule automatically.

tracking.title: Adherence tracking
tracking.description: Log completed routines, skip days, or add notes. See your history at a glance with clear status indicators.

inventory.title: Inventory management
inventory.description: Track your supplies with vial-level detail. Get reminders before you run low so you never miss a day.

highlight.label: Offline-ready
highlight.title: Works without internet
highlight.description: All data syncs automatically when you're back online. Use ProtocolPal anywhere.

technology.headline: The system behind your routine
technology.description: Built with modern web standards for speed, reliability, and privacy. Your data stays on your device until you choose to sync.

item1.label: PWA
item1.caption: Install on any device — works like a native app without the app store.

item2.label: Offline-first
item2.caption: Queue actions offline. Everything syncs seamlessly when connectivity returns.

item3.label: Bilingual
item3.caption: Full support for English and Bahasa Melayu. Switch anytime.

item4.label: Secure
item4.caption: OAuth login via Google. Row-level security keeps your data private.

item5.label: Open stack
item5.caption: Next.js, Supabase, and Tailwind CSS. Fast, modern, and maintainable.
